articles.description: Home-school After talking to several families, I have some suggestions regarding teaching and class sizes. We could greatly increase the amount of home-schooling. articles.title: Not only is Lake Powell's water level plummeting because of drought, its total capacity is shrinking, too
articles.description: Lake Powell, the second-largest human-made reservoir in the US, has lost nearly 7% of its potential storage capacity since 1963, when Glen Canyon Dam was built, a new report shows.

articles.title: Japan Offshore Wind Auctions Need Revamp, Industry Group Says
